name: Bebop (Ziirael)
description:
Alpha stage space game, set in the year 2242. Fight against the space pirate gang - 'the Nox' in Story mode, or just fly about in open space in sandbox mode.

Bebop currently has no story mode but will be added in future updates.

Next Update:
    New and improved shooting mechanic
    Sound improvement
    Lighting/Texture/Post Processing
    Level 1 of the Story mode
